faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is a UAE offshore bank account?
items.answer: An offshore bank account empowers you to hold, invest, and manage your wealth and assets within and beyond the UAE.

items.question: Can non-residents open an offshore bank account in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, our expert consultants assist expats in setting up a personal or corporate bank account in the UAE offshore.

items.question: Why should I open a UAE offshore bank account?
items.answer: An offshore bank account offers you access to the UAE’s local and global markets, competitive tax rates, and the convenience to transact in over 200 countries.

items.question: Is there a minimum requirement for setting up an offshore bank account?
items.answer: Typically, UAE offshore bank accounts require a minimum investment of $5,000 to $100,000, depending on the legal structure, type of bank account, and banking partner.

items.question: How long does it take to set up a UAE offshore bank account?
items.answer: It generally takes 4-8 weeks to open an offshore bank account in the UAE. Our experts streamline the paperwork and approvals to expedite setup times.
